mapper.insert: insert into seer_interest (interest_id, interset_name, interset_img, interset_describe) values (#{interestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intersetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intersetImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intersetDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select interest_id, interset_name, interset_img, interset_describe from seer_interest
